# Changelog

> **Tags:**
> - [New Feature]
> - [Bug Fix]
> - [Spec Compliancy]
> - [Breaking Change]
> - [Documentation]
> - [Internal]
> - [Polish]

## 1.2.0

* **New Feature**
  * Allow using pngquant plugin via advanced options
* **Polish**
  * Match default `optimizationLevel` 2 in plugin in this loader's defaults

## 1.1.0

* **New Feature**
  * Allow options in an `imagemin` property on the webpack config
